title: Care homes across Canada desperate for staff amid COVID-19 outbreak turn to librarians, museum workers - The Globe and Mail
description: Care homes across Canada desperate for staff amid COVID-19 outbreak turn to librarians, museum workers The Globe and Mail Long-term care homes are COVID-19 hotspots | Power & Politics CBC News Ontario long-term care minister defends COVID-19 response despite …
content:
Residents and staff wave to family and friends who came out to show support of those in the McKenzie Towne Long Term Care centre, where there are 35 confirmed COVID-19 cases, in Calgary, Alta., on April 2, 2020. 
Jeff McIntosh/The Canadian Press
